prompts: Create a playful monkey-like Pokemon with green accents and a unique tail.
Show me a fighting-type Pokemon that has a sleek black and white design.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in forest environments and has a strong bond with its team.
Generate a Pokemon character that showcases agility and teamwork in battles.
Make an energetic creature that combines a normal and fighting type with a distinctive appearance.
Design a Pokemon that is adept at climbing and jumping through trees in its habitat.
Give me a creative interpretation of a Pokemon that symbolizes strength and camaraderie.

distinctive_features: Distinctive black and white fur pattern
